verses.text: \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, don’t rebuke \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* anger, neither discipline \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath.

\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* faint. \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, heal \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3068"\w* troubled.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* great anguish. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—\w how|strong="H3588"\w* long?

Return, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Deliver \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* loving kindness’ sake.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no memory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*. \w In|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol,\f + \fr 6:5 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* thanks?

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am weary \w with|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* groaning. \w Every|strong="H3588"\w* night \w I|strong="H3588"\w* flood \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bed. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* drench \w my|strong="H3588"\w* couch \w with|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* tears.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* eye wastes \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* grief. \w It|strong="H3915"\w* grows old \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* adversaries.

Depart \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* workers \w of|strong="H5869"\w* iniquity, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* heard \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* weeping.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* supplication. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* accepts \w my|strong="H8085"\w* prayer.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* enemies \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dismayed. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* turn \w back|strong="H3947"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* disgraced suddenly.
